title: Amazon Bedrock multi-agent collaboration reaches GA
summary: AWS announced general availability of Bedrock multi-agent collaboration with observability and infrastructure-as-code support.

title: OpenAI introduces ChatGPT agent
summary: OpenAI launched ChatGPT agent capabilities that combine reasoning and action for multi-step tasks.

title: OpenAI Operator integrated into ChatGPT agent mode
summary: Operator browser-based capabilities were integrated into ChatGPT agent mode and standalone Operator was sunset.
